name: Clair
text:
Pinoy nga yung #ubuntu-ph. it's the loco channel ;)
 
 
Amarok is impressive. I tried it when Mandrake 10.1 OR came out. Astig! May
live cd pa nga na basically Amarok talaga yung ffeature ;) Check it out on
distrowatch :D
 
 
As for desktop environments. you could opt for which one everytime you login.
Everything is just a sudo apt-get install away. I personally recommend XFCE ;)
Looks sleek and it's light :D
